posts.post_title: Polar Bear Walter Johnson SGC 40 (only 2 SGC 50s higher) $530 delivered
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Matt
Tough card in mid grade with the Polar Bear back - SGC has only 2 graded higher and they're both 50s.

Last SGC 40 with a common back sold for $577 and last one with a PB back sold for over $650.  Selling for $530 delivered.  Insurance at your option.

Card has a light crease in the top left corner that doesn't go through to the back.
